title: Ticket #3501: Really fix RemoteIwd for PBS/LSF jobs
description:
Job attribute RemoteIwd doesn't work for blahp-based jobs. The blahp always creates a temporary directory in which to run the job. This doesn't work well for Pegasus, which wants to run each job in a directory that was previously created and populated with files for that job. When using other job types (e.g. vanilla), they rely on RemoteIwd to have HTCondor start the job in the desired directory.

Before blahp-over-ssh supported file transfer between the gridmanager and blahp, we co-opted RemoteIwd to specify the directory on the blahp machine where job files resided (#2913). This ticket would modify that behavior to match RemoteIwd's meaning in other job universes.
